function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of research on factors influencing PPE production, distribution, and usage","Impact":"Increased risk of PPE shortages and inadequate protection for healthcare workers","Mitigation":"Conducting in-depth research on PPE production, distribution, and usage to inform effective strategies","Technologies":"Advanced monitoring systems for tracking PPE inventory and usage","People":"Healthcare workers, frontline workers, and patients","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Deficiency in pandemic spark assessment and prior containment strategies","Impact":"Inability to contain outbreaks effectively and efficiently","Mitigation":"Conducting research on pandemic spark assessment and developing robust containment strategies","Technologies":"Data analytics, predictive modeling, and monitoring systems for early detection","People":"Public health officials, policymakers, and researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Feasibility and cost issues in implementing strategic protocols","Impact":"Inequality in access to effective pandemic mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Addressing adaptability and cost issues through sustainable business models and international collaboration","Technologies":"Digital healthcare platforms, data analytics for cost-effectiveness, and sustainable supply chain management","People":"Global populations, policymakers, and healthcare providers","Owner":"Global health organizations, government agencies, and international healthcare coalitions"}]}
